item.title: Java/Kotlin Expert Needed - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a highly skilled Java/Kotlin expert to join our team. As an expert in both Java and Kotlin, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining high-quality, efficient, and scalable applications. You should have a strong understanding of object-oriented programming principles and be comfortable working with complex algorithms and data structures. The ideal candidate will have experience working with frameworks such as Spring Boot and Android Studio. Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to work independently are also essential for this role.

Skills required:
- Java
- Kotlin
- Object-oriented programming
- Spring Boot
- Android Studio
- Problem-solving

This is a medium-sized project with a duration of 1 to 3 months.

Expertise level: Expert

Hourly Range: $30.00-$54.00
Posted On: July 19, 2024 04:41 UTC
Category: Mobile App Development
Skills:Java, Kotlin, Android, Android App Development, Smartphone
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Bespoke Trading Algorithm for Platform - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking an experienced developer to design and implement a bespoke & Secure trading algorithm for our platform. The algorithm will focus on perpetual autonomous auctions, handling both buy and sell sides effectively.

Responsibilities:
- Develop a custom trading algorithm tailored to our specific requirements.
- Implement and optimize the algorithm to ensure efficient and accurate trading.
- Collaborate with our team to integrate the algorithm into our existing platform.
- Provide documentation and support for the developed solution.

Requirements:
- Proven experience in developing trading algorithms.
- Strong understanding of perpetual autonomous auctions.
- Proficiency in relevant programming languages and technologies.
- Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.

Preferred Qualifications:
- Previous experience in the financial technology sector.
- Familiarity with our platform's technology stack.

How to Apply:
Please submit your resume, a brief cover letter explaining your relevant experience, and examples of previous work related to trading algorithms.

We look forward to hearing from you!


Posted On: July 19, 2024 03:29 UTC
Category: Full Stack Development
Skills:Python, JavaScript, C#, Java, Algorithm Development, PHP, C++, Web Development, Machine Learning
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Improve current MQL4/5 EA & add hedging also - Upwork
item.description:
Description of Current Trading Algorithm Strategy
I currently run a grid trading strategy on my Expert Advisor (EA). Here is an overview of how the strategy works:

Trigger for Trades: The opening of trades is dictated by candle closures. Specifically:
A bearish candle results in a sell order.
A bullish candle results in a buy order.
Multiplicator and Fixed Lot: Each subsequent order uses a multiplicator and a fixed lot size.
Step and Take Profit: There is a predetermined step between orders, and a take profit (TP) level is set for each trade.
No Stop Loss: Currently, no stop loss is used in this strategy.
Improvement Goals
I want to improve the strategy to:

Limit risk while maintaining a profitability rate of 5-15% per month.
Implement a hard stop loss based on a percentage of the account's equity.
Integrate hedging to manage drawdown and profit when the EA is on the wrong side of the market, awaiting a retracement to hit the TP.
Request for Expert Input
Job Description:
I am seeking an experienced trading algorithm developer to help improve my grid trading strategy. The goals of the project are to:

Limit Risk: Advise on best practices for limiting risk while maintaining a profitability rate of 5-15% per month.
Implement Hard Stop Loss: Develop and implement a hard stop loss based on a set percentage of the account's equity. Provide recommendations on the appropriate percentage.
Integrate Hedging: Develop a hedging mechanism to manage drawdown and profit when the EA is on the wrong side of the market. Provide guidance on effectively integrating hedging into the existing strategy.
Requirements:

Proven experience in developing and improving trading algorithms, particularly grid strategies.
Strong understanding of risk management techniques.
Expertise in implementing stop loss and hedging mechanisms.
Ability to maintain or improve the current profitability rate of 5-15% per month.
Deliverables:

Detailed plan and implementation of risk limitation strategies.
Implementation of a hard stop loss feature based on equity percentage.
Development and integration of an effective hedging mechanism.
Documentation and explanation of all changes made to the strategy.
Looking forward to your inputs on how we can improve the EA and the best way to implement hedging.

Hourly Range: $30.00-$85.00
Posted On: July 19, 2024 02:09 UTC
Category: Scripting & Automation
Skills:MQL 4, MetaTrader 4, MQL 5, Forex Trading, Financial Analysis, Java
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Angular JS and Spring Boot UI developer needed - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for an experienced UI developer that is skilled in AngularJS,  Javascript, APIs to complete and enhance a sophisticated Energy IOT platform dashboard that we have built for end-to-end monitoring, control and management of Renewable Microgrids and Aggregates of such Microgrids. These Microgrids could consist of Solar, Battery Storage, Gensets, EV Chargers and Thermostats deployed at various sites. OpenEGrid UI architects and engineering team have already built out the new dashboard required for this purpose, however, there are bug fixes needed, feature upgrades and minor changes to the charts and options from time to time based on customer/user feedback. We would like to bring in a skilled developer who has implemented or supported a sophisticated UI dashboard for such complex projects (not necessarily related  to Energy IOT or Microgrids) , with experience implementing/supporting such AngularJS and Spring Boot based frameworks.
We would like to hire right away if we find the right candidate. Our company is based in California, USA.   
   

Hourly Range: $15.00-$30.00
Posted On: July 18, 2024 20:28 UTC
Category: Front-End Development
Skills:AngularJS, CSS, JavaScript, Java, API
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Software Development FinTech API - Upwork
item.description:
MurkingStocks aims to revolutionize stock analysis by providing a user-friendly yet professional platform that integrates real-time financial data, customizable portfolio management tools, and AI-powered insightful reports, empowering investors to make informed decisions with confidence.

Help develop a real time stock analysis tool. 1. Launch a user-friendly web and mobile platform for stock analysis.
2. Integrate real-time financial data from sources like Yahoo Finance, Bloomberg, and Apple Stock News.
3. Implement AI features for article summarization and sentiment analysis.
4. Provide personalized portfolio management tools with easy customization options.


Front-end: HTML, CSS, Javascript, React, Next.js, TailwindCSS, DaisyUI, Bootstrap
Back-end: Express.js, Node.js, Django, Flask, Firebase
Databases: PostgreSQL, MongoDB, MySQL
APIs: REST, GraphQL, SOAP, gRPC

Machine Learning: TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-Learn, Keras, Pandas, NumPy
AI: Natural Language Processing (NLP), Computer Vision, Reinforcement Learning, OpenAI GPT, IBM Watson, Azure AI

Automation: Selenium, Ansible, Jenkins, Puppeteer, Docker, Kubernetes
CRM & ERP: Salesforce, HubSpot, Zoho CRM, SAP ERP, Odoo, Microsoft Dynamics 365

Algorithmic Trading: Python (pandas, NumPy, matplotlib, TA-Lib), QuantConnect, MetaTrader 4/5, Interactive Brokers API, Backtrader, Zipline

Budget: $300
Posted On: July 18, 2024 20:20 UTC
Category: Full Stack Development
Skills:API, JavaScript, RESTful API, Node.js, Database Architecture, Java, PHP, API Integration, FinTech, API Development
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Software Developer for Upstream Oil and Gas Sector - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled software developer to create a custom platform, providing an alternative to bill.com and openinvoice, specifically tailored for the upstream oil and gas sector. This platform will handle billing, invoicing, and financial transactions, streamlining processes and improving efficiency. As the software developer, you will be responsible for designing and developing the platform, ensuring it meets the unique requirements of the industry.

Skills required:
- Proficiency in software development languages such as Java, C++, or Python
- Strong understanding of billing and invoicing systems
- Experience in database management and integration
- Knowledge of the upstream oil and gas sector

This is a medium-sized project with an estimated duration of 3 to 6 months. We are looking for an expert software developer with a deep understanding of the industry. Join our team and contribute to the digital transformation of the upstream oil and gas sector.


Posted On: July 18, 2024 20:15 UTC
Category: Full Stack Development
Skills:JavaScript, Web Development, Graphic Design, CSS, Web Design
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Ð¡++ Developer with Computer Vision and AR experience - Upwork
item.description:
C++ Developer for Ocean Library Integration

We are looking for an experienced C++ developer to integrate and work with the Ocean library developed by Facebook. The ideal candidate should have the following skills and experience:

- **Strong proficiency in C++**.
- **Experience with computer vision (CV) and augmented reality (AR) applications**.
- **Platform-specific expertise**:
  - iOS: Proficiency in Objective-C/Swift.
  - Android: Proficiency in Java/Kotlin.
  - Oculus Quest: Experience with Oculus SDK and VR development.

- Familiarity with high-performance image processing, photogrammetry, and rendering algorithms.
- Ability to work with detailed documentation and examples provided by the library.

Currently, we aim to develop an MVP (Minimum Viable Product) for our project using the Ocean library. This library is very new and recently released. If the MVP meets our expectations, this project has the potential to expand significantly. We request applications only from individuals with substantial experience in developing similar applications using C++.



Budget: $800
Posted On: July 18, 2024 20:01 UTC
Category: AR/VR Development
Skills:Augmented Reality, OpenCV, Computer Vision, AR Application, iOS, Android, C++
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Experienced Tuya App Developer with Expertise in Tuya Backend - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Tuya app developer with a strong background in Tuya backend development. Our project involves integrating and managing smart home devices through the Tuya platform, and we require a developer who can efficiently handle the backend processes and ensure seamless functionality.

Responsibilities:

Develop, maintain, and enhance mobile applications using the Tuya platform.
Integrate Tuya IoT devices into our existing systems.
Manage and optimize Tuya backend services.
Troubleshoot and resolve any issues related to Tuya app and backend integration.
Collaborate with our team to understand project requirements and deliver high-quality solutions.
Stay updated with the latest Tuya platform features and best practices.
Requirements:

Proven experience in developing applications using the Tuya platform.
Strong knowledge of Tuya backend services and APIs.
Proficiency in programming languages such as Java, Kotlin, Swift, or similar.
Experience with cloud services and IoT device integration.
Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
Good communication skills.
Preferred Qualifications:

Previous experience with smart home automation projects.
Familiarity with other IoT platforms and technologies.
Experience in UI/UX design for mobile applications.
Understanding of security protocols and data protection measures in IoT environments.
Project Details:

Project Type: Ongoing project
Estimated Duration: [Specify the estimated duration]
Budget: [Specify your budget or rate]
How to Apply:

If you are passionate about IoT and have the necessary skills and experience with the Tuya platform, we would love to hear from you. Please submit your proposal along with:

A brief cover letter detailing your experience with Tuya app and backend development.
Examples of previous projects involving Tuya or similar platforms.
Your availability and estimated timeline for project completion.
Your hourly rate or project-based fee.
Join us in creating innovative smart home solutions that make a difference. We look forward to working with you!

Hourly Range: $10.00-$50.00
Posted On: July 18, 2024 19:54 UTC
Category: Mobile App Development
Skills:Android, Smartphone, iOS, Mobile App Development, Android App Development, iOS Development
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: WordPress Plugin Specialist - Upwork
item.description:
Overview:
We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced WordPress Specialist to manage and maintain updates for our extensive WordPress multisite network. Our network comprises hundreds of sites that require regular updates to WordPress versions, plugins, themes, and potentially custom code to ensure smooth functionality and security.

Responsibilities:
• WordPress Version Updates: Ensure that all sites within the multisite network are running the latest stable version of WordPress.
• Plugin Updates: Update and maintain all plugins across the network, ensuring compatibility and functionality.
• Theme Updates: Update themes across all sites, addressing any compatibility issues that arise.
• Code Updates: Review and update custom code to maintain functionality and compatibility with new versions of WordPress, plugins, and themes.
• Automation Implementation: Develop and implement an automated system for future updates to ensure seamless integration and minimal downtime.
• Quality Assurance: Be meticulous and detail-oriented to ensure that our clients’ sites are not damaged, hindered, or experience downtime during the updating process.

Requirements:
• Proficiency in WordPress: Extensive experience with WordPress multisite networks, including version updates, plugin management, and theme updates.
• Coding Skills: Strong knowledge of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, and MySQL. Ability to troubleshoot and update custom code as needed.
• Problem-Solving Skills: Ability to identify, troubleshoot, and resolve issues that arise during updates.
• Attention to Detail: Ensure that all updates are thoroughly tested and implemented without disrupting site functionality.
• Automation Experience: Experience in setting up automated systems for updates.

Preferred Qualifications:
• Experience with Large Networks: Prior experience managing updates for large WordPress multisite networks.
• Security Knowledge: Understanding of WordPress security best practices to ensure that updates do not compromise site security.
• Communication Skills: Ability to communicate effectively with our team regarding progress, issues, and solutions.

If you are a WordPress expert with a proven track record in managing large multisite networks and are looking for a challenging and rewarding opportunity, we would love to hear from you.
Please submit a cover letter detailing your relevant experience, and examples of previous work or case studies.

Hourly Range: $22.00-$44.00
Posted On: July 18, 2024 19:20 UTC
Category: CMS Development
Skills:Java, SQL, WordPress, WordPress Plugin, CSS, PHP, JavaScript, HTML, Plugin Development
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: AI Diagnostic Platform Development Team - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a small development team with expertise in building AI diagnostic platforms for mental health startup. The team should consist of at least 2 experienced fullstack developers and one QA. The goal of this project is to create a user-friendly platform that utilizes AI algorithms to analyze mental health data and provide accurate diagnostic insights. The team will be responsible for developing the platform's frontend and backend components, integrating AI algorithms, conducting thorough testing, and ensuring seamless functionality.

   Key Skills:
   - Proficiency in fullstack development
   - Strong knowledge of AI algorithms and machine learning techniques (the AI portion will be built by CTO onshore team)
   - Experience in system integration, e.g. EHR integration
   - Expertise in frontend and backend development
   - QA testing and debugging skills

   If you are passionate about leveraging technology to improve mental health services and have the required skills, we would love to hear from you!

   Please include your relevant experience and portfolio when applying for this gig.


Posted On: July 18, 2024 18:26 UTC
Category: Full Stack Development
Skills:Python, JavaScript, Artificial Intelligence, API, Java, React
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Senior Full Stack Developer - Upwork
item.description:
* MUST BE FLUENT IN BOTH WRITTEN AND SPOKEN ENGLISH.
* MUST BE ABLE TO WORK PST TIMEZONE

Growing startup in need of a friendly, talented, and highly skilled full-stack developer to add to our team, long-term!

Requirements:

1. Expert in Core PHP and Yii including Object Oriented Programming, MVC, WooCommerce, MYSQL, Java Script, JQuery, HTML, CSS, AJAX.

2. Creation of custom themes, plugins/widgets from scratch. Familiarity with various common and proven Wordpress and Woo plugins.

3. Optimization of code and database queries.

4. Knowledge of how to interact with RESTful APIs and formats (JSON, XML) and Postman. Should have hands-on integration experience with one or more third party APIss like payment gateways, live chat, Google APIs, Algolia etc.

5. React Native Or Ionic experience with woo/Wordpress REST api

6. Package manager e.g. Composer

7. Testing frameworks e.g. PHP Unit

8. Chat GPT API Integration experience

Huge Pluses:
1. Familiarity with using command line tools on Linux servers is a plus.
2. Involvement in the open source community is a plus
3. Experience with WP CLI, WordPress Coding Standard is a plug point.
4. Knowledge of DevOps or working with Cloud platform i.e. AWS and it's ecosystem tools knowledge.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$20.00
Posted On: July 18, 2024 17:12 UTC
Category: Full Stack Development
Skills:JavaScript, PHP, API Integration, API, React, CSS, AngularJS, Node.js, HTML, Web Development
Country: United States

item.title: Sr. Java and AWS Developer - Upwork
item.description:
Hello. I need to build a backend application. It will be developed using Java and hosted using the AWS Amplify service. we will use Cognito, AWS’ directory and authentication service, to manage user accounts and access privileges.
All data that needs to be persisted is stored in AWS RDS (Relational Database Service).

- Key design principles
Our review of the scope of work (SOW) and our experience with and understanding of the history and current state of the ASAP service led us to a summary of the key design principles:
• Serverless
• Standards-based
• A stateless messaging hub/service bus
• Transient storage
• Rules-based routing
• Loosed-coupled microservices
• Internet-based security and encryption

I attached the AWS architecture as a screenshot below, you need to create lambda functions with Java and deploy them to AWS.

You need to work in US business hours like 10am - 5pm EST.
Let me know if you can do it.

Thanks.

Hourly Range: $9.00-$12.00
Posted On: July 18, 2024 16:20 UTC
Category: Back-End Development
Skills:AWS Lambda, AWS Amplify, Java, Amazon Web Services, Amazon Cognito, Amazon CloudWatch, Amazon RDS, Terraform
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: App Developer for Construction Inspection Reporting - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for an experienced app developer to build a mobile application for construction inspection reports. The app will allow users to easily create, manage, and submit inspection reports on construction sites. The ideal candidate should have a strong background in mobile app development and experience working with construction-related projects.

  Responsibilities:
  - Develop and implement the app functionalities according to the provided requirements
  - Ensure app performance, usability, and responsiveness
  - Collaborate with the design team to create an intuitive user interface
  - Conduct thorough testing and debugging to ensure app stability

  Skills:
  - Proficiency in mobile app development (iOS and Android)
  - Knowledge of programming languages such as Swift, Java, or Kotlin
  - Familiarity with API integrations
  - Experience with construction-related projects is a plus

Requirements and Features:
Common features shall include:
• User authentication and roles (inspectors, project managers, etc.)
• Project management (add, edit, delete projects)
• Inspection report creation and management
• Plans & drawings attachments
• Photo and video attachments
• Plans , drawings and photos mark up & notation.
• Files uploads (photos, plans, pdf files, vidoes).
• GPS location tagging
• Offline mode for areas with no internet connectivity
• Signature capture
• PDF report generation
• Notifications and reminders
• Data synchronization with a backend server
• Unit testing for individual components
• Integration testing for API interactions
• User acceptance testing (UAT) with actual users
• Performance testing to ensure the app works smoothly under various conditions
      Image and video recognition APIs that can be integrated into the app for tasks like object detection, scene recognition, and more.
advance features such as: Provides image analysis capabilities, including text extraction, object detection, and labeling.

Maintenance and Updates: After deployment, gather user feedback and monitor app performance. Regularly update the app to fix bugs, improve performance, and add new features.

Choose Technology Stack:
Select the technology stack based on your target platforms (iOS, Android, web). Common choices include:
• Frontend: React Native, Flutter, or native development (Swift for iOS, Kotlin/Java for Android)
• Backend: Node.js, Django, or any other backend framework
• Database: Firebase, PostgreSQL, MongoDB
• Cloud Services: AWS, Google Cloud, Azure for hosting and storage



  We anticipate this project to be of medium size, with a duration of 3 to 6 months. The ideal candidate should have an expert level of expertise in app development and a strong attention to detail. If you are passionate about creating user-friendly apps that streamline processes in the construction industry, we would love to hear from you!

Budget: $100
Posted On: July 18, 2024 12:49 UTC
Category: Mobile App Development
Skills:Node.js, Firebase, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Personal Computer, Firebase Cloud Firestore, Firebase Realtime Database, Azure Cosmos DB, SQLite, Microsoft SQL Server, MySQL, SAP SQL Anywhere, AI Mobile App Development, Mobile App Testing, iOS Development, Hybrid App Development, Native App Development, Microsoft Windows, iPadOS, User Authentication, In-App Purchases, Review or Feedback Collection, Social Media Account Integration, User Profile Creation, Bluetooth, Camera, In-App Search, Payment Functionality, API Integration, Push Notifications, Location-Based Service, Advanced Analytics, Microsoft Excel, Java, PHP, Smartphone, iOS, Figma to Webflow Plugin, Sketch, Adobe XD, Web API, Django, AWS Application, Google Cloud Platform, Azure App Service, Android, Mobile App Development, JavaScript, Tablet
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Trading programmer for E*Trade - Upwork
item.description:
Automated Risk Management System for E*Trade Pro

**Description:**

I am an experienced trader with 11 years in the industry, using E*Trade Pro as my primary trading platform. I am seeking a skilled programmer with expertise in E*Trade Pro to develop an automated system to enhance my risk management protocols.

**Project Requirements:**

1. **Automatic Position Closure:**
   - Implement a feature that automatically closes a position after a loss of $1,500.

2. **Daily Loss Limit:**
   - Develop a mechanism to close down my trading account for the day and restrict further trading access after a daily loss of $2,000.

**Additional Details:**
- Further tasks may be added as the project progresses to maximize risk management.
- Experience with E*Trade Pro is essential.

**Qualifications:**
- Proven experience in developing automated trading systems.
- Familiarity with E*Trade Pro platform and its APIs.
- Strong programming skills in relevant languages (e.g., Python, Java).
- Excellent problem-solving and analytical abilities.

**How to Apply:**
Please provide:
- A brief overview of your experience with similar projects.
- Examples of previous work related to automated trading systems.
- Your proposed approach and timeline for this project.

I look forward to working with a dedicated professional to enhance my trading strategy and ensure robust risk management.


Hourly Range: $20.00-$80.00
Posted On: July 18, 2024 05:26 UTC
Category: Scripting & Automation
Skills:Automation, API Integration, Dashboard, AI Trading
Country: United States
click to apply

I am an experienced trader with 11 years in the industry, using E*Trade Pro as my primary trading platform. I am seeking a skilled programmer with expertise in E*Trade Pro to develop an automated system to enhance my risk management protocols.

**Project Requirements:**

1. **Automatic Position Closure:**
   - Implement a feature that automatically closes a position after a loss of $1,500.

2. **Daily Loss Limit:**
   - Develop a mechanism to close down my trading account for the day and restrict further trading access after a daily loss of $2,000.

**Additional Details:**
- Further tasks may be added as the project progresses to maximize risk management.
- Experience with E*Trade Pro is essential.

**Qualifications:**
- Proven experience in developing automated trading systems.
- Familiarity with E*Trade Pro platform and its APIs.
- Strong programming skills in relevant languages (e.g., Python, Java).
- Excellent problem-solving and analytical abilities.

**How to Apply:**
Please provide:
- A brief overview of your experience with similar projects.
- Examples of previous work related to automated trading systems.
- Your proposed approach and timeline for this project.

I look forward to working with a dedicated professional to enhance my trading strategy and ensure robust risk management.


Hourly Range: $20.00-$80.00
Posted On: July 18, 2024 05:26 UTC
Category: Scripting & Automation
Skills:Automation, API Integration, Dashboard, AI Trading
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Testing and Validating Mobile App Monitoring Plugin - Upwork
item.description:
We have developed a plugin that is integrated with a mobile app and is used to collect and report performance metrics about a mobile app. The metrics include device utilization, app launches, app crashes, third party call performance, etc. A web UI is in place to report the collected metrics.

This project supports both native (Android & IOS)  and hybrid applications (React Native), ensuring comprehensive coverage across different platforms.

We are seeking assistance to test and validate our plugin:

- Testing will involve injecting the monitoring plugin using sample apps  to assess functionality, performance, and overall user experience.
- The scope of the testing includes functional testing and the benchmarking/comparison of the application performance before and after embedding the monitoring plugin.
- You will also need to assess compliance with the relevant App Stores.
- For native app testing, must use 2 sample apps each on Android and iOS and your testing must cover the latest 3 versions of the mobile platform.
- For hybrid app testing, you must use 2 sample apps built using React Native with minimum and maximum versions.
- The sample apps must include between at least 5-10 screens. Where possible, use sample apps available in the public domain.
- You will need to be able to simulate different scenarios - e.g., app slowness, crashes, etc.

During the scope of the project, you will be provided access to the Web UI for analyzing and comparing metrics captured by the plugin.

The ideal candidate should have experience in mobile app testing, familiarity with security methodologies, and a keen eye for detail to ensure the highest standards of security and performance. This is an excellent opportunity to contribute to a cutting-edge project and help enhance the robustness of mobile applications.

Testing reports must be provided as a deliverable for this project.  Evidence and samples of data and apps used for the project must be provided at the end of the project. A knowledge transfer session must be arranged at the end of the project.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$35.00
Posted On: July 18, 2024 03:49 UTC
Category: Manual Testing
Skills:Bug Tracking & Reports, Test Case Design, Test Execution, Test Design, Annotated Screenshot, Test Plan, Test Results & Analysis, Usability Testing, Compatibility Testing, End-to-End Testing, Performance Testing, Android, Functional Testing, Java, Smartphone, Bug Reports, Software QA, Mobile App Testing, JavaScript, iOS
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Google Cloud Text-to-Speech Developer - Upwork
item.description:
*******************************************************
Please apply this job with your sample demo work. Our rates are flexible for your skill sets. If you do not have any sample work, please do not apply.
*******************************************************


We are seeking a skilled developer who has experience working with the Google Cloud Text-to-Speech API. The ideal candidate should be proficient in utilizing this API to convert text into natural-sounding speech. As a developer, you will be responsible for implementing and integrating the API into our existing systems. This project requires strong knowledge of Google Cloud services and expertise in programming languages such as Python or Java. Attention to detail, problem-solving skills, and the ability to work independently are essential. If you have prior experience with text-to-speech technologies and are eager to contribute to this project, please apply now.

We have couple of projects and we need to integrate each of them to support our customers.



Hourly Range: $15.00-$25.00
Posted On: July 18, 2024 01:37 UTC
Category: Full Stack Development
Skills:Google Cloud Platform, API, Python
Country: United States
click to apply

item.description:

item.title: App Developer with Experience in AI - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking an experienced app developer with a strong background in building mobile applications. The ideal candidate will have previous experience working on app development projects in the Czech Republic, Poland, or Austria. As an app developer, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and testing mobile applications for our clients. This role requires proficiency in programming languages such as Java, Swift, or Kotlin, as well as a solid understanding of mobile app design principles and user experience. If you have a strong track record of successful app development projects and are looking for an exciting opportunity, we would love to hear from you!

Relevant Skills:
- App development
- Programming languages (Java, Swift, Kotlin)
- Mobile app design
- User experience
- Testing and debugging

Hourly Range: $30.00-$54.00
Posted On: July 18, 2024 00:01 UTC
Category: Mobile App Development
Skills:Android, iOS, Smartphone, Search Engine Optimization, Review or Feedback Collection
Country: United States
click to apply
